ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: cursed be the Companions of the Pit -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That accursed are the men of the trench
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: the people of the pit were destroyed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: may the people be condemned those who tortured (the believers) in ditches
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Accursed be the People of the Ditch!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Cursed were the People of the Ditch.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Cursed be the makers of the pit,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: slain were the Men of the Pit,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Self-)destroyed were the owners of the ditch
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: destroyed were the people of the trench,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Perish the fellows of the ditch,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: perish the People of the Ditch!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Woe to the makers of the pit (of fire),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Cursed were the people of the ditch (the story of the Boy and the King).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The companions of the pit were killed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Destroyed were the People of the Trench.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Cursed were the companions of the trench
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [85:4] perish, accursed be, the men of the ditch!, the pit in the ground,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Self-)destroyed were the owners of the ditch
